job_details.Vacaturetitel: Software Developer Internship: wafer alignment applications
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Alignment Software Application Group is responsible of developing software applications on product wafer alignment domain at ASML. We create tools that helps our customers to optimize, monitor and diagnose wafer alignment process performed within Twinscan.

   Your Assignment

   You will be joining the Proact Team within the Software Development Group. Your task will be to:
     * Support in developing scripts that would improve daily work; such as scripts that would automate tasks that software developers are performing
     * Create a proof of concept Large Language Models (LLM) on premise and offline, where we collect, ingest documents; train the LLM with our custom information and be able to ask questions to documents, Become an intern at a Dutch company that's a global industry leader. You'll gain valuable experience in a highly innovative environment - one that sparks your imagination and creativity. In addition to a monthly internship allowance (plus a possible housing or travel allowance), you'll get practical guidance from experts in the field and the chance to work in and experience a dynamic team environment.
job_details.full_text:
Software Developer Internship: wafer alignment applications

Alignment Software Application Group is responsible of developing software applications on product wafer alignment domain at ASML. We create tools that helps our customers to optimize, monitor and diagnose wafer alignment process performed within Twinscan.

   Your Assignment

   You will be joining the Proact Team within the Software Development Group. Your task will be to:
     * Support in developing scripts that would improve daily work; such as scripts that would automate tasks that software developers are performing
     * Create a proof of concept Large Language Models (LLM) on premise and offline, where we collect, ingest documents; train the LLM with our custom information and be able to ask questions to documents, Become an intern at a Dutch company that's a global industry leader. You'll gain valuable experience in a highly innovative environment - one that sparks your imagination and creativity. In addition to a monthly internship allowance (plus a possible housing or travel allowance), you'll get practical guidance from experts in the field and the chance to work in and experience a dynamic team environment.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on developing scripts to automate tasks for software developers and creating a proof-of-concept LLM for internal document querying. While it mentions LLMs, the core tasks lean towards scripting and automation for internal tools rather than building production-grade GenAI applications or complex ML models. The role appears more aligned with traditional software development and basic AI tool utilization.

phrases: Support in developing scripts that would improve daily work
scripts that would automate tasks that software developers are performing
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate the development of software tools (scripts) to enhance the efficiency of existing software development processes, which falls under traditional software development.

phrases: Create a proof of concept Large Language Models (LLM) on premise and offline
train the LLM with our custom information
be able to ask questions to documents
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to the creation and training of an LLM, which is a form of model development, even if it's a proof of concept and focused on a specific application like document querying.
Collecting and ingesting documents is a foundational step in preparing data for an LLM, which is part of the data engineering process.

soft_skills.skill: gain valuable experience in a highly innovative environment - one that sparks your imagination and creativity
practical guidance from experts in the field
chance to work in and experience a dynamic team environment
